nodes.text: Clone flametroopers were clone troopers of the flame trooper corps in the Grand Army of the Republic.
A group of flame troopers under the command of Jedi General Ki-Adi-Mundi and Clone Commander CC-1993 "Jet" were highly effective against the Geonosians during the Second Battle of Geonosis.

Initially, clone flametroopers were outfitted with MK I insulated armor, but that armor was severely flawed in that it didn't have sufficient respirator filtration. The problem was quickly fixed in the MK II "Hotspot" Insulated Armor and they switched to that armor.
They used BT X-42 heavy flame projectors.
